- File system (templates, generated code, migration tracking) (001-restack-gen-cli)

- Python 3.11+ + Click (CLI framework), Jinja2 (templating), Pydantic (type safety), restack-ai SDK, google-generativeai (Gemini) (001-restack-gen-cli)
